participant_1.name: Riya
participant_1.personality: Dedicated and empathetic, Riya is passionate about her studies and enjoys the challenges of medical school. She values family and has a nurturing spirit.
participant_1.background: I am in my second year of medical school. I have two children but I am divorced. My mom is the best baker in my family. I am a Hindu living in Louisiana.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Creative and laid-back, Jake loves to explore his hobbies and enjoys capturing moments through photography. He appreciates the simple pleasures in life, like the sound of rain.
participant_2.background: I enjoy spending a lot of money on my hobbies. I donâ€™t like waking up early. I love photography. I love the sound of the rain.

content.text: Hi, I'm participant_2. What do you do for fun?
I'm in my second year of medical school. I'm a Hindu living in Louisiana. My mom is the best baker in my family.
That's really cool! I love photography and spending a lot of money on my hobbies. I don't like waking up early, but I love the sound of the rain.
That's awesome! I love photography too, but I don't have as much time for it as I'd like. I'm not a morning person either, but I love the rain.
What's your favorite thing about being in medical school?
I love learning about the human body and helping people. I also love the challenge of it.
That's great! I'm sure you're going to be a great doctor.
I like to read, play video games, and spend time with my kids.
That's cool! I like to read and play video games too. I don't have any kids, but I love being around them.
It's great to have kids. They keep you young and active.
I'm sure they do! I'm looking forward to having some of my own someday.
I'm sure you'll be a great parent.
